description: Welcome to Tom Clancy's The Division; a truly unique, next-gen, online, open-world, RPG.
title: The Division Podcast

episodes.title: State of the Game #174 – 11 November 2020
episodes.description: Hamish, Johan and Trick show off the new items coming in TU12 and chat about the upcoming, multi-phase PTS.

episodes.title: State of the Game #173 – 5 November 2020
episodes.description: Hamish, Trick and MacKenzie go through some of the improvements coming in TU12 with a slew of changes to The Summit and some great new quality of life features. More inventory space? You bet.

episodes.title: State of the Game #172 – 8 October 2020
episodes.description: Hamish, Johan and MacKenzie go through all of the changes coming to The Summit in TU11.1. Spoilers, it's a lot.

episodes.title: State of the Game #171 – 23 September 2020
episodes.description: Hamish, Trick & Johan go over the fixes that'll be arriving for TU11 as well as the upcoming Season and what it holds!

episodes.title: State of the Game #169 – 16 September 2020
episodes.description: Hamish is joined by Yannick and MacKenzie as they go over the upcoming release of TU11 and the fixes that have happened in the PTS.

episodes.title: State of the Game #169 – 2 September 2020
episodes.description: Hamish, Bruce and MacKenzie drop some big information and a first look at The Summit; the new upcoming PvE mode coming in TU11. New gear? We've got that too.

episodes.title: State of the Game #168 – 26 August 2020
episodes.description: Hamish, Nikki & Johan go over some changes that are coming in Title Update 11.

episodes.title: State of the Game #167 – 19 August 2020
episodes.description: Hamish, Yannick and Johan show off the new Appearance Mod feature coming in TU11.

episodes.title: State of the Game #166 – 05 August 2020
episodes.description: Hamish, Yannick and Johan return from vacation to chat about the upcoming PTS for TU11.

episodes.title: State of the Game #165 – 08 July 2020
episodes.description: Hamish, Nikki & Bruce go over the upcoming changes that'll be arriving in Title Update 10.1 as well as the changes to loot distribution.

episodes.title: State of the Game #164 – 01 July 2020
episodes.description: Hamish, Yannick & Nikki talk about the Worlds First Race for Operation Iron Horse as well as the upcoming changes.

episodes.title: State of the Game #163 – 17 June 2020
episodes.description: Hamish is joined by Yannick and Nikki as they go over some of the changes that arrived in TU10, the new Season 2 and the Raid release date.

episodes.title: State of the Game #162 – 10 June 2020
episodes.description: Hamish, Johan & Yannick go over how the PTS ran and the release date for both TU10 and Season 2.

episodes.title: State of the Game #161 – 27 May 2020
episodes.description: Hamish, Yannick & Bruce talk about how the first phase of the PTS is going as well as what is in store for Phase 2.

episodes.title: State of the Game #160 – 20 May 2020
episodes.description: Hamish, Yannick & Nikki go over the upcoming PTS and the changes they will be tested for the upcoming Title Update 10.

episodes.title: State of the Game #159 – 13 May 2020
episodes.description: Hamish is joined by Chris and Trick to go over seasons, the end of Season 1 and what's in store for the future!

episodes.title: State of the Game #158 – 06 May 2020
episodes.description: Hamish, Chris and MacKenzie go over the big changes coming in next weeks update, TU9.1.

episodes.title: State of the Game #157 – 29 April 2020
episodes.description: Hamish and Chris go over the latest activities in the current Season as well as some fixes that are on the way.

episodes.title: State of the Game #156 – 22 April 2020
episodes.description: Hamish is joined by Chris & Bruce as they go over the changes that TU9 as brought as well as address the concerns the community has.

episodes.title: State of the Game #155 – 15 April 2020
episodes.description: Hamish is joined by Chris and Nikki this week as they go over changes to Exotic items and making your level 30 Exotics useful!

episodes.title: State of the Game #154 – 01 April 2020
episodes.description: Hamish, Chris & Bruce cover the last week in The Division 2, what's going on as well as going over the recent repercussions of the exploits.

episodes.title: State of the Game #153 – 25 March 2020
episodes.description: Hamish is joined by Yannick and Chris as they go through the launch of the games first Global Event as well as what is currently being looked at it and fixed in the near future.

episodes.title: State of the Game #152 – 18 March 2020
episodes.description: In this week's State of the Game, Hamish is joined by Yannick & Chris as they go over the problems the team are looking into as well as the launch of the games first League!

episodes.title: State of the Game #151 – 11 March 2020
episodes.description: Hamish is on vacation so Chris is hosting this week's State of the Game, Trick, Yannick and Drew join him to go over the issues the team are currently working on as well as everything regarding the launch of The Division 2's first Season!

episodes.title: State of the Game #150 – 05 March 2020
episodes.description: Hamish, Yanick and Drew go over the launch of Warlords of New York and what to expect in the coming weeks.

episodes.title: State of the Game #149 – 26 February 2020
episodes.description: Hamish along with Trick and Yannick go through the new Endgame content that you'll be able to play in Warlords of New York.

episodes.title: State of the Game #148 – 19 February 2020
episodes.description: Hamish is joined by Drew and MacKenzie in this week's State of the Game as they go over the factions within The Division 2's expansion, Warlords of New York

episodes.title: State of the Game #147 – 12 February 2020
episodes.description: Hamish along with Drew & Yannick go into a little bit more detail around Warlords of New York's End Game as well as how seasons are going to work.

episodes.title: Warlords of New York Reveal Post-Show
episodes.description: Hamish along with a whole host of guests go over everything that's coming in The Division 2's first-ever expansion, Warlords of New York.

episodes.title: State of the Game #146 – 05 February 2020
episodes.description: It's time for some lore! Hamish along with John and Drew recap the whole story from the start of The Division 1 all the way up until the latest content of The Division 2.

episodes.title: State of the Game #145 – 29 January 2020
episodes.description: Hamish, Yannick & Drew go over Episode 3 and what it brings including the new Specialization and Chameleon Exotic weapon.

episodes.title: State of the Game #144 – 22 January 2020
episodes.description: Hamish is joined by Fredrik and Bruce as they go over all new Skills and Recalibration changes.

episodes.title: State of the Game #143 – 15 January 2020
episodes.description: Hamish,  Fredrik & Drew go over the new ways gear will work in an upcoming update.

episodes.title: State of the Game #142 – 08 January 2020
episodes.description: Hamish, Yannick & Drew talk about Episode 3 content as well as what's changing within the game.

episodes.title: State of the Game #141 – 04 December 2019
episodes.description: Join Hamish and Drew for the latest on the deployment of TU6.1, the implementation of Hardcore and a look to some future UI changes coming in an unannounced update.

episodes.title: State of the Game #140 – 04 December 2019
episodes.description: Hamish, Yannick & Drew chat about the upcoming 6.1 Update that brings a lot of fixes as well as a side project that the team here at Massive have been working on.

episodes.title: State of the Game #139 – 13 November 2019
episodes.description: Hamish and Chris go over the latest fixes within the game as well as talk about future shows and content.

episodes.title: State of the Game #138 – 23 October 2019
episodes.description: Hamish and Drew go over some of the recent changes and tweaks that arrived with Episode 2 and Title Update 6.

episodes.title: State of the Game #137 – 16 October 2019
episodes.description: Hamish and Chris talk about the release of Title Update 6 and Episode 2.

episodes.title: State of the Game #136 – 10 October 2019
episodes.description: This week Hamish is joined by Fredrick Thylander and Yannick Banchereau and they talk about everything that's arriving in Episode 2 as well as when.

episodes.title: State of the Game #135 – 02 October 2019
episodes.description: Hamish and Trick Dempsey, Senior Game Designer chat about the Mastery System and Shepard System that's coming with Episode 2.

episodes.title: State of the Game #134 – 25 September 2019
episodes.description: Hamish and Fredrik spoke about all things Episode 2 as well as the latest changes that took place on the PTS.

episodes.title: State of the Game #133 – 18 September 2019
episodes.description: Community Developer Chris Gansler talks to Terry Spier and Keith Evans from Red Storm about their work on the upcoming TU6.

episodes.title: State of the Game #132 – 11 September 2019
episodes.description: We're back! In this show, we talk to Nikki Kuppens about some of the latest changes you can expect in the next update; loot, gear, named items recalibration and crafting.

episodes.title: State of the Game #131 – 31 July 2019
episodes.description: Today on the show, Hamish and Chris chat about the recent release of Episode 1; the changes that have already made their way into the game and the current issues that are being worked on. Also, there's another ETF happening soon! Get that passport ready.

episodes.title: State of the Game #130 – 24 July 2019
episodes.description: This week Hamish is joined by Community Developer Chris Gansler and the two dig deep into the drop of Episode 1: D.C. Outskirts, the apparel event #3: Heat Wave, and like always talk about known issues and coming fixes.

episodes.title: State of the Game #129 - 17 July 2019
episodes.description:
Hamish is this week joined by Yannick and the two go through the Base of Operations rework, the Shepherd Reward System, the new apparel event “Heatwave”, and clarify what loot will drop in the Raid Discovery Mode.
Enjoy the episode, Agents!

episodes.title: The Division Podcast #28 - Interview with Extremis Malis writer Christofer Emgård
episodes.description: Christofer Emgård, the writer of The Division: Extremis Malis comic, visited us at the studio to talk about his work in both comics and games – including The Division.

episodes.title: State of the Game #125 - 19 June 2019
episodes.description: Hamish is this week joined by Fredrik "The Weapons Guy" Thylander, to discuss the Title Update 4, the bullet registration issue, changes to the Merciless and the new "Gunner" specialization.

episodes.title: State of the Game #124 - 12 June 2019
episodes.description: This week you get a recap of the news dropped on UbiE3 and a fresh interview with Terry Spier, Creative Director at Ubisoft Red Storm, on his experience presenting at the Ubisoft E3 Conference this year. Game Designer Rasmus Künstlicher joins host Hamish Bode talking about TU4, The Year 1 Roadmap, known issues, and coming changes.

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 27 – “Getting ready for E3”
episodes.description: Chris Gansler and Petter Mårtensson chat about E3, from a Community Developers point of view.

episodes.title: State of the Game #123 - 5 June 2019
episodes.description: This week Hamish is joined by Lead 3C Designer Fredrik "The Weapons Guy" Thylander. The two discuss future changes to specializations and signature ammo, the PTS and the new specialization “Gunner".

episodes.title: State of the Game #122 - 29 May 2019
episodes.description: This week Lead AI Designer Drew Rechner joined Hamish and talked all about AI and NPC behavior. Starting off the episode with the known bugs and planned fixes for The Division 2, and moving deep into the NPC and AI issues that were introduced with TU3 and what lessons were learned by those.

episodes.title: State of the Game #121 - 22 May 2019
episodes.description: This week Hamish is joined by Community Developer Chris, they start off by spotlighting the first three squads to complete the Operation Dark Hours raid, good job Agents! They also discuss the difficulty of the raid and what fixes are being worked on for Title Update 3.1 and teasing Title Update 4.

episodes.title: State of the Game #119 - 8 May 2019
episodes.description: With the upcoming Title Update 3 release Hamish and Yannick talk about all of the changes players can expect as well as the fixes with the next patch.

episodes.title: State of the Game #118 - 24 April 2019
episodes.description: In this week's show, Hamish and Rasmus chat about the upcoming changes to Recalibration, Gear Score, Crafting and a bunch of stuff in between. Want to know what we're looking at for the next phase of the PTS? We've got you covered, Agent.

episodes.title: State of the Game #117 - 17 April 2019
episodes.description: This week, Hamish sits down with Terry and Ryan from Red Storm to go through the TU3 testing plans, what this means for the Raid and a whole bunch of the changes that we're testing on the PTS.

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 26 – "Broken Dawn with Author, Alex Irvine”
episodes.description: We sit down with Alex Irvine, author of the new The Division 2 novel Broken Dawn to discuss his new book, his previous work on The Division and his other projects.

episodes.title: State of the Game #116 - 10 April 2019
episodes.description: With the release of TU2, Hamish and Yannick go through how that all went down and some of the upcoming fixes to the game including some quality of life changes for the players.

episodes.title: State of the Game #115 - 3 April 2019
episodes.description: Fredrik and Chris sit down to talk about the upcoming Invasion: Battle for D.C. update as well as some of the intended changes to weapons and gear.

episodes.title: State of the Game #114 - 27 March 2019
episodes.description: We sit down with Trick and Yannick to go through what players can expect from World Tier 5 and the upcoming release of the next Stronghold; Tidal Basin. Want to know the latest fixes as well? We've got you covered.

episodes.title: State of the Game #113 - 20 March 2019
episodes.description: Get caught up on the latest The Division 2 news with our weekly State of the Game livestream; back again in podcast form! Yannick and Hamish chat about the first week, the issues that have already been fixed and much more.

episodes.title: State of the Game #120 - 15 May 2019
episodes.description:
This week Hamish and Yannick talk about the just-released Title Update 3 as well as invasion resets, classified assignments, the new apparel event and maybe most exciting – the release of the first 8 player raid in the history of The Division – Operation Dark Hours going live tomorrow May 16!
Are you ready for the raid, Agent?

episodes.title: State of the Game #92: 08/03/2018
episodes.description: Did someone say "The Division 2"?!

episodes.title: State of the Game #91: 01/03/2018
episodes.description: The turtleneck is back! Want to know how that whole thing panned out? So many stats, so little time. Check it out now and enjoy your commute, Agent.

episodes.title: State of the Game #90: 22/02/2018
episodes.description: Want to know what's going to be happening with those Classified drop rates? Petter and Jim have you covered in this week's State of the Game.

episodes.title: State of the Game #85: 11/01/2018
episodes.description: Yannick and Petter sit down in our 85th State of the Game for a chat about the upcoming Global Event and the current happening in The Division.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 21/12/2017
episodes.description: In our last State of the Game for 2017, Yannick and Hamish go through the lastest Global Event and some extra things you'll need to know for the holiday break. Happy Holidays, Agents!

episodes.title: State of the Game: 14/12/2017
episodes.description: Petter and Yannick go over the latest news with 1.8 and the Global Event. Stats with Yannick? We've got you covered.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 07/12/2017
episodes.description: Can't watch Twitch while driving in your car? Well, you definitely shouldn't be doing that. Yannick and Petter talk about the release of 1.8 and the upcoming Global Event in our latest State of the Game podcast.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 30/11/2017
episodes.description: Yannick and Hamish talk to Red Storm about the impending free update: 1.8. Get the latest news right here!

episodes.title: State of the Game: 09/11/2017
episodes.description: As we get closer to Update 1.8, Petter sits down with Terry and Jim to chat about some of the work they're most excited about sharing with our players.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 02/11/2017
episodes.description: On this week's State of the Game, Petter chats to Terry and Keith from Red Storm about the upcoming Free Udpate: 1.8.

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 25 – "Getting to know you, getting to know all about you”
episodes.description: It's been too long, but now is the time to have a talk with James, Johan and Anthony from our Community Team. Listen and learn all the juicy details about these lads. Promise you won't regret it!

episodes.title: State of the Game: 12/10/2017
episodes.description: Petter chats to Sam and Mark from Reflections about Global Events, the PTS and more! We've got the latest news for you right here.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 05/10/2017
episodes.description: Petter tries to break his State of the Game speedrun... and fails. Listen in as Red Storm joins the show to talk about upcoming PTS changes and more!

episodes.title: State of the Game: 28/09/2017
episodes.description: Petter has the latest on the PTS and all of the upcoming events you need to know about. With the next Global Event right around the corner, it's time to get prepared!

episodes.title: State of the Game: 21/09/2017
episodes.description: We take a tour around the world on the State of the Game this week; Malmö, Leamington, North Carolina. We've got new Underground additions, PTS news and more!

episodes.title: State of the Game: 14/09/2017
episodes.description: Rogue 2.0? Resistance? We've got you covered. Hamish and Petter talk to Terry and Keith from Red Storm about the upcoming changes.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 31/08/2017
episodes.description: It's time to talk about 1.8! Hang out with the Community team as they talk to Red Storm about West Side Piers with a personal tour from Tony Sturtzel. #HYPE

episodes.title: State of the Game: 24/08/2017
episodes.description: Our first Global Event: Outbreak is done! Hamish and Yannick talk about Leaderboards, Masks and how we're dealing with the current State of the Game.

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 24 – "Zen and the Art of... Art”
episodes.description: Another day, another casual podcast. Hamish is joined by Mat and Jeremy from the Environment Art team to talk about how making art used to be, how it is now and what the future may hold. Go get it.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 17/08/2017
episodes.description: 1.7 dropped on Tuesday, so let's talk about the new Global Event, Masks, Leaderboards and all the other stuff that is on the mind of the Community.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 10/08/2017
episodes.description: 1.7 is coming next Tuesday! We've got more news to get you prepared. Ready yourselves, Agents.

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 23 – "ComDev Coffee Catch Up”
episodes.description: Hamish, Petter and Yannick walk in to a bar... Please send your best punch lines.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 03/08/2017
episodes.description: Yannick and Hamish sit down to chat about the closing of the PTS and the upcoming Update 1.7.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 29/06/2017
episodes.description: Today we've got news for all of you that want to know about the PTS! Also, taking off sunglasses? It's gonna be a thing.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 22/06/2017
episodes.description: Today on the show, Hamish talks to Terry and Keith from Red Storm about "Classified" Gear Sets, upcoming changes on the PTS and we even threw some NinjaBike in there too.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 15/06/17
episodes.description: Today we talk to Reflections about the new Commendations feature coming in 1.7! Also, Hamish misses Yannick.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 01/06/2017
episodes.description: Today on State of the Game we bring back a familiar face to chat about the issues in 1.6.1 as well as provide a bit of extra cringe.

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 22 – "Post-ETF Wrap Up”
episodes.description: Hamish, Yannick and Petter talk a bit about ETF Charlie and we also answer the question on everyone's lips; "how mad does Mario Kart 8 make Yannick?"

episodes.title: State of the Game: 18/05/2017
episodes.description: 1.6.1 is on the way next Tuesday while we'll be headed to Newcastle for the ETF! Want to meet up? Details inside.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 11/05/2017
episodes.description: State of the Game: 11/05/2017 by Massive Entertainment

episodes.title: State of the Game: 04/05/2017
episodes.description: This State of the Game has a very heavy backpack flavour. Happy Star Wars Day folks! \/

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 21 – "Writing the World”
episodes.description: Hamish sits down with Noel Walling and Bruce Kelly from the Narrative team to talk about writing the world of The Division. Also, we delve into the realms of "Howlgate". Hamish didn't howl.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 27/04/2017
episodes.description: PTS. ETF. Acronyms! Sign up and join us in Newcastle in 4 weeks. Do it.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 20/04/2017
episodes.description: The PTS is coming for 1.6.1 tomorrow - get ready, Agents!

episodes.title: State of the Game: 13/04/2017
episodes.description: Loadouts? They're coming to 1.6.1! Let's goooooo!

episodes.title: State of the Game: 30/03/2017
episodes.description: Today Yannick and Hamish talk about the happenings including the premiere of our new polling system. FANCY.

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 20 – "Is This Mic Still On?”
episodes.description: Yes, it's been a while and today I wanted to make sure that all of the tech is still working. Huzzah! It is. Now that we've got that out of the way, I'd like to get some more casual podcasts out to all of you. Enjoy!

episodes.title: State of the Game: 23/03/2017
episodes.description: Hamish solos State of the Game again. Get ready for some Kiwi rambling!

episodes.title: State of the Game: 16/03/2017
episodes.description: Time to clear up the confusion surrounding the Year 2 conversation. Stick around Agents! We need your feedback.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 02/03/2017
episodes.description: Yannick and Hamish go over the week that saw Last Stand and Patch 1.6 drop. Also, Yannick almost tells a joke. True story!

episodes.title: State of the Game: 23/02/2017
episodes.description: Yannick decided to not show up again. THANKS GUY. But seriously, release date for Last Stand and Patch 1.6 lies within... enjoy!

episodes.title: State of the Game: 16/02/2017
episodes.description: We don't have a release date for 1.6 and Last Stand but at least Yannick is back. Spoilers, this one is light on news but heavy on the cringe. 10/10 would listen.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 09/02/2017
episodes.description: Hamish and Keith talk through the latest changes with PTS 4. Defiler new meta?

episodes.title: State of the Game: 02/02/2017
episodes.description: Yannick reads Patch Notes for PTS 3! That's all you need to know. It's amazing.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 26/01/2017
episodes.description: We've got heaps of information about the first iteration of the PTS as well as what the expect for the next! Fredrik Thylander joins Yannick and Hamish to give us the low-down.

episodes.title: State Of The Game: 19/01/2017
episodes.description: We're back! In this first stream of 2017, Keith and Terry get Skyped in for a chat about Last Stand. Also, what's up with those new Dark Zone... zones?

episodes.title: State of the Game: 22/12/2016
episodes.description: It's the last one of the year! But don't fret, there's a holiday gift coming for all our players. More news inside.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 15/12/2016
episodes.description:
Red Storm Developers, Terry and Keith, join us on State of the Game today! Lot's to talk about, mostly PvP things... But, if you've never learned how, you'll find out how to make the best possible coffee. Thanks Newco.

How to Make Coffee: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rWcmEdEmeHw

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 19 – "The Brain of a Hunter”
episodes.description: How does one go about making that formidable foe that has undoubtedly chopped you down with their axe? Drew Rechner and Måns Ohlsson tell me how on this week's podcast.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 08/12/2016
episodes.description: ETF? Yep, let's do it again! This time, with a North Carolina flavour. Or, should I say "flavor"?

episodes.title: State of the Game: 01/12/2016
episodes.description: After the launch of 1.5 on all platforms and Survival on PC and Xbox One, Yannick and Hamish go over the current issues and upcoming fixes. Spoilers, things might get a bit weird.

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 18 – "Snödroppe”
episodes.description: Today Simona and Tim from the Snowdrop team tell us a bit about how it is to work on an engine that was designed from the ground up for The Division. Also, Lego. It's a thing.

episodes.title: State Of The Game: 24/11/2016
episodes.description: We're back again to let you know what's going on, specifically in regards to PS4 and update 1.5. Listen on to find out more.

episodes.title: State Of The Game: 17/11/2016
episodes.description: What do you do when Yannick leaves the country? Commit to a very strange solo mission in this week's State of the Game. Survival release dates? Yep.

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 17 – "Community Team Assemble!”
episodes.description: When the Community Team gets together from their corners of the world, stuff like this happens.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 10/11/2016
episodes.description: In this State of the Game, Yannick drops a few bombs. Stash size? Listen to find out more!

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 16 – "New York Collapse with Author, Alex Irvine”
episodes.description:
Hamish talks to Alex Irvine about how New York Collapse, the companion Survival Guide for The Division was created. How do you write a book with so many layers? Only Alex knows.

BUY IT NOW: www.newyorkcollapse.com

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 15 – "JSS”
episodes.description: Survival is a thing! You may have been caught unawares by the sneaky drop of the PTS yesterday so I thought it'd be nice to slow things down to catch up with Matthieu (Lead Game Designer) and Fredrik (Weapons Guy) to talk about some of the things you may have missed. Enjoy!

episodes.title: State of the Game: 03/11/2016
episodes.description: Yannick and Hamish talk about some of the upcoming changes that you might begin to expect from 1.5 as well as go over the current issues for the week. Enjoy!

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 14 – "Casual Podcast is Casual”
episodes.description: Hamish, Yannick and Petter give the new mics a test run in the fancy "Podcast Corner". Spoilers, it's really just a dark corner of an ever increasingly cramped room. Whoops.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 27/10/2016
episodes.description: We're back with a new State of the Game after the recent release of 1.4. There are still things to do, but 1.4 is looking like a huge step forward for The Division. Let's go!

episodes.title: State of the Game: 20/10/2016
episodes.description: 1.4 has a release date! We'll be dropping it on all platforms on Tuesday October 25th and in this podcast, Fredrik and Drew tell us what their experience was like with the brand new PTS workflow.

episodes.title: State of the Game: 06/10/2016
episodes.description: Today Nikki Kuppens, Senior Game Designer, joins us State the Game; lending an all-knowing brain to discussions about loot. Find out what to expect from Week 3 of the PTS for the upcoming Update 1.4!

episodes.title: State of the Game: 29/09/2016
episodes.description: Welcome to the very first Podcast for State of the Game! We hope you enjoy being able to find out all the latest news directly from whatever you listen to your podcasts on, just be sure not to yell NERF too much in public. That'd be weird.

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 13 – "Building the Dragon's Nest”
episodes.description: Noel Walling and Jeremy Estrellado chime in with some behind the scenes info on Dragon's Nest, our latest Incursion. Also, who wouldn't want to know more about these guys?!

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 12 – "E3 Hangs with Boomslangg and SkillUp”
episodes.description: Come behind the scenes at E3 with Hamish, Boomslangg and SkillUp! We managed to find a not-so-quiet corner of the Ubisoft Lounge to chat about all the latest news that recently dropped at E3 in L.A.

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 11 – "Your Friendly ComDev Duo”
episodes.description: Hamish and Yannick do the first ever LIVE podcast. If you didn't manage to catch it on Twitch, this one's for you; take it on the bus, the train, your daily commute or even listen to it in the bath. Actually, don't do the bath thing... electricity and water are dangerous.

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 10 – “We Live to Server”
episodes.description: Anders Holmquist, Technical Director talks to Hamish Bode about how the servers for The Division operate and some of the recent misinformation that has made its way onto the internet. This is our first one-on-one podcast so you can expect something a little bit different.

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 9 – “Incursions and Beyond”
episodes.description: We're back! In Episode 9, Hamish talks to Lead Game Designer, Matthias and Lead Economic Designer, Andrada about the evolution of The Division as we get closer to our first Incursion and Update 1.1. Welcome back.

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 8 – “Alpha Takeaways”
episodes.description: Community Developers, Hamish and Yannick, are joined by Associate Live Producer, Kevin Goyon and Lead Game Designer, Mathias Karlson for an Alpha takeaway discussion. In the following discussion the team dives into how the Alpha has improved the development of the game and what to expect with the Closed Beta which starts January 28 for Xbox One and January 29 for PlayStation 4 and PC.

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 7 - "Sweet, Sweet Loot"
episodes.description: Who wants to know more about loot? Are you itching to discover more about the equipment in The Division? What a coincidence, that’s exactly what this podcast is about. In Episode 7, Hamish talks to Game Designers Matthieu Desisle and Marcus Rosengren; finding out as much as we can about exactly how you can itemize your character and customize your experience in the game.

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Special Episode - "Community Team Invasion"
episodes.description: It's always "good times" when Natchai and Torie, your resident Community Managers, come to the studio... so why not record them for good measure? Join Hamish, Torie and Natchai as they talk about The Division as well as a whole bunch of potentially embarrassing things. Actually, there's nothing shameful about bowling a perfect 300, right?!

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 6 - "The Agent’s Journey"
episodes.description: Time to get some more information on the character progression and customization in our latest The Division: Podcast. Hamish sat down with Senior Character Artist, Emil Mujanovic and Game Designer, Drew Rechner to pick their collective brains; highlighting the way that you’ll experience our game through the lens of your Agent.

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 5 - "Building the World"
episodes.description:
As we wave good-bye to the sun until next summer here in Sweden, Hamish pulled aside two experts at conveying lighting and weather changes within Tom Clancy’s The Division. Lead Environment Artist Chad Chatterton and Senior Lighting Artist Damien Tournaire join us to recap their experiences in New York and share how they translate that into the NYC we’ll explore throughout The Division.

In this fifth episode, we pick Chad and Damien’s brains to find out their process, thoughts, inspirations, and even a bit of the technical side behind lighting and environmental aspects of The Division.

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 4 - "E3 Community Roundtable"
episodes.description: E3 has come and gone, but we had to jump at the chance to have a chat with some of the greatest minds from The Division community when we were over in Los Angeles. So, straight after the Twitch Community Event on June 16, Hamish sat down with Marco Roest (or MarcoStyle), Marco Scheltner (MyDivision.net) and Caleb McAllister from SmartWatch Podcast.

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 3 - "A Visit From Red Storm"
episodes.description: In this third episode, we find out how the Tom Clancy veterans from Red Storm are impacting the development of the game and a whole lot more. Hold on to your ears, smile oddly to yourself if you end up listening to this in public and make sure to let us know what you think.

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 2 - “Behind the Music”
episodes.description:
Is there a better place to talk about all things aural than in a podcast? Hamish Bode sits down with Ola Strandh and Simon Koudriavtsev to find out exactly how're they're shaping the world of The Division through music and audio. 

More information on www.thedivisiongame.com

episodes.title: The Division Podcast: Episode 1 - “How it all Began”
episodes.description:
In our first episode, Hamish Bode talks to Game Director, Ryan Barnard as well as Martin Hultberg our resident IP Developer and military expert. Have you ever wanted to know how Martin’s self-confessed obsession started out? Or Ryan’s goals for the Dark Zone?

More information on www.thedivisiongame.com
